segments.text: Hello , Bobby , It seems that I can't arrive at your home by 12 o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happened ? We're all expecting you , Hans , Dick , Archie ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so sorry , I've been held up by the damn traffic jam for half an hour . I'd have arrived but for that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Where are you now , Li ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thirty meters ahead is the Waterloo Bridge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not far away from home , It's - let me see â€“ about 20 minutes'walk , Can you walk here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've thought of that , but what can I do with my car ? If only I had taken a taxi !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad , But don't worry.We ' ll put off dinner till one o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so terribly sorry to keep you waiting .
segments.speaker: S1
